Description: Rim sherd with turn to wall of Chian pottery Ionian cup with everted rim; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black (and partly worn) below; exterior, slip mostly worn; reserved; inscription on exterior.
Curator's comments: The numbers 84 and 8 are written in pencil on the exterior surface of the sherd. The number 8 is written on a paper label glued to the interior surface of the sherd.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1912) (phase 2)
